patient_info: Abnormal vagina morphology,Delayed speech and language development,Abnormality of the breast,Cafe-au-lait spot,Elevated circulating alkaline phosphatase concentration,Large cafe-au-lait macules with irregular margins,Increased circulating free T3,Premature pubarche,Increased serum estradiol,Decreased thyroid-stimulating hormone level,Increased circulating progesterone,Metrorrhagia,Abnormal eating behavior
golden_diagnosis: McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic
predict_diagnosis:
1. McCune-Albright syndrome (MAS)
2. Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia with endocrine dysfunction
3. Monostotic fibrous dysplasia with endocrine abnormalities
4. Endocrine disruptor syndrome with vaginal and breast abnormalities
5. Congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency
6. Fragile X-associated primary ovarian insufficiency (FXPOI)
7. Turner syndrome with mosaic features and endocrine disturbances
8. Rett syndrome with endocrine and gynecological abnormalities
9. Propionic acidemia with metabolic and endocrine manifestations
10. Chromosome 11q deletion syndrome with variable expressivity and endocrine involvement

Please note that these diagnoses are based on the provided symptoms and the complexity of rare diseases. A comprehensive evaluation, including genetic testing, hormonal assays, and imaging studies, would be necessary to confirm the exact diagnosis.
